title: Kylie Jenner Wore a Leather Dress with a Thigh-High Leg Slit for Halloween Weekend
text:
View photos Photo credit: Instagram More

From Marie Claire

Kylie Jenner spent Halloween weekend partying with close friends Anastasia Karanikolaou and Sofia Richie.

The makeup mogul wore a leather dress by Christian Cowan, featuring a thigh-high leg slit.

Later in the night, Kylie dressed up as Madonna circa 2003, and reenacted the superstar's onstage MTV VMAs kiss with Britney Spears.

Kylie Jenner has started celebrating Halloween already, and she picked the perfect outfit for it.

Rocking head-to-toe black leather, the Kylie Cosmetics founder looked chic in a Christian Cowan dress. With a revealing leg slit, and button detailing, the chic dress was the perfect pre-Halloween choice, especially as she coordinated it with matching heels.

Standing in a communal shower (because where else is more appropriate on Halloween weekend?), Jenner captioned her photo, "showering you with loooooooks 🖤🖤🖤🖤 🚿."

Kylie was filmed walking hand-in-hand with Sofia Richie, as the pair attended a J Balvin concert. Jenner and Richie were also caught on camera swigging tequila from the bottle, and washing it down with a Red Bull chaser.

In another cute video, Kylie borrowed will.i.am's light-up glasses.

Later in the night, Kylie showcased her first Halloween costume of 2019. Recreating the iconic performance given at the 2003 MTV VMAs, Jenner transformed into Madonna, while Anastasia Karanikolaou became Britney Spears. The pair sang along to "Like a Virgin," and even replicated Britney and Madonna's onstage kiss.

Presumably Kylie is only just getting started, and she'll showcase many more costumes before Halloween is over.
